entry.title: New release for Phanpy: 2024.12.28.119d4b0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix text expander not working correctly in lists by @kizu in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1003

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/compare/2024.12.08.7e1ffc5...2024.12.28.119d4b0

entry.title: New release for Phanpy: 2025.03.12.4e6820d
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Increase global masto api timeout by @alexkrolick in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1037
  • Fix nodeinfo query on split-domain instances by @Drakulix in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1081

New Contributors

  • @alexkrolick made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1037
  • @Drakulix made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1081

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/compare/2025.01.26.24f03f5...2025.03.12.4e6820d

entry.title: New release for Phanpy: 2025.04.26.0d0fa92
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Show the emoji shortcode in statuses when hovering, like Mastodon's native's frontend does by @VirtualWolf in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1064

New Contributors

  • @VirtualWolf made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1064

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/compare/2025.03.22.85d964f...2025.04.26.0d0fa92
